com.github.gwtd3.api.core

Class RGBColor

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.gwt.core.client.JavaScriptObject
      • com.github.gwtd3.api.core.Color
        • com.github.gwtd3.api.core.RGBColor

  • public class RGBColor
extends Color
    A color defined by red, green and blue components.
    Author:
    Anthony Schiochet
    See Also:
    official API

      Returns a brighter copy of this color with a gamma of 1.

      • r

        public final int r()
        Returns:
        the red component in the range [0;255]

      • g

        public final int g()
        Returns:
        the green component in the range [0;255]

      • b

        public final int b()
        Returns:
        the blue component in the range [0;255]

      • hsl

        public final HSLColor hsl()
        Returns the equivalent color in HSL space; see d3.hsl for details on the returned object. The conversion from HSL to RGB is described in CSS3 Color Module Level 3; this is the equivalent reverse operation.
        Returns:

      • brighter

        public final RGBColor brighter()
        Returns a brighter copy of this color with a gamma of 1.
        Returns:
        the new copy

      • brighter

        public final RGBColor brighter(int k)
        Returns a brighter copy of this color.

        Each channel is multiplied by 0.7 ^ -k.

        Parameters:
        k - the gamma value
        Returns:
        the new copy

      • darker

        public final RGBColor darker()
        Returns a darker copy of this color with a gamma of 1.
        Returns:
        the new copy

      • darker

        public final RGBColor darker(int k)
        Returns a darker copy of this color.

        Each channel is multiplied by 0.7 ^ k.

        Parameters:
        k - the gamma value
        Returns:
        the new copy
